```{r}
library("ggplot2")
library("readr")
library("inference")
library("purrr")
library("dplyr")
theme_set(theme_bw())
dpath <- function(s, d=params$output_path) {
  file.path(d, s)
}
```

```{r}
paths <- dir(params$output_path, "pi_hat*", recursive = TRUE) %>%
  dpath()
```

```{r}
pi_hat <- map_dfr(paths, read_csv, col_types = cols(), .id = "path")
```

```{r}
pi_hat$path <- as.integer(pi_hat$path)
pi_hat$sca <- grepl("sca", paths)[pi_hat$path]
pi_hat$method <- c("CNN", "CNN", "RCF", "VAE")[pi_hat$path]
pi_hat$split <- factor(pi_hat$split, levels = c("train", "dev", "test"))
```


```{r, fig.height = 4, fig.width = 12}
ggplot(pi_hat %>% filter(j > 0, sca)) +
  geom_line(
    aes(x = log(lambda), 
        y = value, 
        col = split, 
        group = jb),
    alpha = 0.5
    ) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set2") +
  scale_x_reverse() +
  labs(
    x = expression(log(lambda)),
    y = expression(hat(Pi)^{b}~(lambda))
  ) +
  guides(color = guide_legend(override.aes = list(size = 4, alpha = 1))) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0.1, 0.5, 0.9)) +
  facet_grid(method ~ j) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
    panel.spacing.x = unit(0, "cm")
  )
#ggsave("~/Desktop/conceptual/learned_inference/notes/figure/selection_paths50-svd.png")
```
